name: SoundSnap
0:
”Alexa open sound snap”
”Alexa play sound snap”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sound snap
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Mini Games.

Get ready to play Sound Snap!! BOIIIIIIIIING. In this game, you'll put your memory to the test as you try to match up our awesome zany sound effects.

To play, simply choose a number and listen carefully to the wacky sound that follows. Keep selecting numbers until you find the matching sound for each one.

Featuring three difficulty levels - easy, medium, and hard - there's a fun challenge waiting for everyone! And remember, the higher the difficulty, the more coins you'll score for your team.

Don't forget, match all the sounds with the fewest guesses possible, and you'll rack up bonus coins! So put your snapping cap on and watch your team's coin stash grow!

Sound Snap supports all Alexa enabled devices, with visual effects and animations for Echo Show devices, as well as immersive sound for devices without a screen.

This skill is part of Mini Games.

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Mini Games.

HUGO FM
